beta\/index.md.Un Beta Testeur est un utilisateur qui t: A Beta Tester is a user who tests versions of the software before they are released to all users
beta\/index.md.Le beta testing permet de remonter des e: Beta testing makes it possible to report errors (functional bug or user interface concerns for example) during the development phase
beta\/index.md.C'est donc une importante source d'améli: It is therefore an important source of improvement for the project, which can bring fresh ideas and test the novelties in real conditions
beta\/index.md.du Core ou des plugins sont des versions: Core or plugins are development versions
beta\/index.md.Même si les développeurs prennent bien s: Even if the developers of course take precautions, these versions may include bugs that could make a plugin or the Core completely inoperative
beta\/index.md.Il faut donc être familier des procédure: You must therefore be familiar with backup and recovery procedures, etc
beta\/index.md.Celle-ci possède donc toutes les futures: It therefore has all the future novelties, but also the most bugs

beta\/index.md.Il est indispensable de tester sur un Ra: It is essential to test on a Raspberry or a test VM, and the Jeedom team cannot be held responsible for any malfunction
beta\/index.md.Tout le monde peut décider de passer son: Anyone can decide to switch their Jeedom from a Stable version to a Beta or Alpha version, with all the necessary precautions mentioned above
